rules.description: caps_lock to esc when pressed alone, to control as modifier

osascript -e 'tell application "Alfred 4" to run trigger "plantMe" in workflow "com.ty.alfred.plantme" with argument ""'

rules.description: Both shift keys toggles caps lock

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "41)Create Fenced Code Line or Block from Selection"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "41)Create Fenced Code Line or Block from Selection"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Launch - Quit Spotify and Simplify"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Launch - Quit Spotify and Simplify"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Toggle Spotify"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Toggle Spotify"'

rules.description: Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Change caps_lock key to command+control+option+shift. (Post escape key when pressed alone)
